overview: Remaking the Legend - Halo 2: Anniversary is a documentary chronicling 343 Industriesâ€™ journey as they re-imagine Halo 2, one of the most beloved video games of all time, for its ten-year anniversary.  Get unprecedented access to the development process as 343 and their team of partners from around the world bring Halo 2 to the Xbox One, while maintaining and honoring its fabled past.
title: Remaking the Legend: Halo 2 Anniversary
